SELECT BBS_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IMG, BBS_DATE, BBS_LIKE_COUNT FROM (SELECT sub.BBS_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IMG, BBS_DATE, BBS_LIKE_COUNT, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT BBS_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IMG, BBS_DATE, BBS_LIKE_COUNT FROM blog_bbs WHERE BBS_HID=0 ORDER BY BBS_LIKE_COUNT DESC) sub) WHERE RNUM >= #{page01} AND #{page02} >=RNUM

SELECT BBS_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IMG, BBS_DATE, BBS_LIKE_COUNT FROM BLOG_BBS WHERE TOPIC_SEQ=#{t_seq} AND SUBSTR(BBS_DATE,1,10)=SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,10) AND BBS_HID=0 AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6 ORDER BY BBS_LIKE_COUNT DESC

SELECT DISTINCT BBS_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_IMG, BBS_DATE, BBS_LIKE_COUNT FROM BLOG_BBS WHERE BBS_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchval}||'%' AND BBS_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchval}||'%' OR BBS_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchval}||'%' OR BBS_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchval}||'%' ORDER BY BBS_LIKE_COUNT DESC

SELECT DISTINCT BLOG_SEQ, M_ID, BLOG_TITLE, BLOG_NICKNAME, BLOG_INTRODUCE FROM BLOG WHERE BLOG_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchval}||'%' AND BLOG_INTRODUCE LIKE '%'||#{searchval}||'%' OR BLOG_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchval}||'%' OR BLOG_INTRODUCE LIKE '%'||#{searchval}||'%' ORDER BY BLOG_TITLE DESC
